q: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
w: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
e: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
r: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

blurd: As mercurial as he is charming, Rakan is an infamous vastayan troublemaker and the greatest battle-dancer in Lhotlan tribal history. To the humans of the Ionian highlands, his name has long been synonymous with wild festivals, uncontrollable parties...
name: Rakan
title: The Charmer
